definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: He paused again, mustering his strength and thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 他又停下来，集中力量，聚精会神。

sentences.english: My eyes fell on Jiang Xin, who sat in a corner, listening attentively.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在一个角落，聚精会神地听着。

sentences.english: Concentrated study will help you to retain knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 聚精会神的学习有助于使所学的知识永记不忘。
听众都在聚精会神地听着。

sentences.english: My sons watch intently as the rich colors of the sunrise soar into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 儿子们聚精会神地望着日出时那喷向天空的缤纷色彩。

sentences.english: A line of people are listening Qingjian jujube development intently.
sentences.chinese: 一行人聚精会神的听着清涧红枣的发展历程。

sentences.english: The audience are absorbed in listening.
sentences.chinese: 听众都在聚精会神地听着。

sentences.english: "Poly-mind" is only the one which is an attitude for changing this world.
sentences.chinese: “聚精会神”是唯一，一种改变世界的态度。

sentences.english: We will continue to dedicate ourselves to development and focus our attention on promoting economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 我们将继续聚精会神搞建设，一心一意谋发展。

sentences.english: He watched breathlessly the spider attempt to spin its web for the third time.
sentences.chinese: 他聚精会神地看蜘蛛企图第三次结网。

sentences.english: Making a model ship absorbed him completely.
sentences.chinese: 造模型船使他聚精会神。

sentences.english: Doing some thing sedulously is a course understanding and practice hard.
sentences.chinese: 聚精会神地做某件事是项经过一番了解与苦练的。

sentences.english: When when sowing, everybody is sedulous listen.
sentences.chinese: 等到播的时候，大家都聚精会神的收听。

sentences.english: The projectionist was panning the camera attentively .
sentences.chinese: 放映员在聚精会神地移动摄影机。

sentences.english: Look, just how creative girl who Qijiang attentively.
sentences.chinese: 瞧，这位綦江小姑娘创作得多么聚精会神。

sentences.english: This boy concentrates on his studies as he sits next to his father in the living room.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩在客厅里坐在他父亲身边，聚精会神的学习。

definition: to concentrate one's attention completely (idiom)/with rapt attention
unable to take one's eyes off (idiom); to gaze steadily/to stare
with keen interest (idiom)/with great pleasure/with gusto/eagerly
to prick up one's ears/to strain to hear sth
variant of 全神貫注|全神贯注[quan2 shen2 guan4 zhu4]
to become exhilarated (idiom); in high spirits/full of zest
to relax with one's eyes closed
